RuntimeErrorResolution.Summary: The aspectj runtime library, aspectjrt.jar, is missing from the classpath and must be added
RuntimeErrorResolution.ProblemDetailHtml: Compiled AspectJ projects have a dependency on some classes that are shipped in the aspectj runtime jar: aspectjrt.jar. Without this jar the woven code cannot execute.
RuntimeErrorResolution.SolutionDetailHtml:
An aspectj runtime is available as part of any AspectJ or AJDT distribution.

If you are using AJDT normally, the extensions to the workbench will automatically add it to any run profiles you create to execute woven code. If you need to add it manually inside Eclipse, you can find it within the org.aspectj.runtime plugin.
